page.title: 16Shopping around Snape,Yorks.
page.content: There is only one shop in the village which sells many different things.It is also the Post Office.It is mainly used by children and older people.Most people go to Bedale and Northallerton to do their weekly shopping,and to buy items like clothes and shoes.Middlesbrough and York are the furthest people travel to shop for clothes and major items. Harrogate is also a favourite shopping centre. People who don't own a car either use the village shop or travel by bus to Bedale on a Tuesday or to Ripon on Thursdays.A mobile shop visits the village once a week.
